summary: AN ORDINANCE submitting to the qualified electors of the City proposed amendments to Article XIX, Sections 1 and 3 and Article VIII, Sections 1, 2, and 3 of the Charter of the City of Seattle and repeal of Article VIII, Sections 4 through 9 of said charter, to be voted upon as a single proposition at the general election to be held on November 5, 1991; calling on the City Clerk to certify the amendment to the Director of the Department of Records and Elections of King County; and providing for its publication.
